text: The system shall track real-time location of all active trains with GPS accuracy of Â±10 meters
The system shall update the central database every 30 seconds
The TMS must authenticate operators via multi-factor authentication before granting access
Train status updates shall be sent to the monitoring service via REST API whenever a train changes state
The system shall generate daily reports of train operations
The system must archive reports for at least 7 years for compliance purposes
Operators shall be able to manually override automated routing decisions in emergency situations
All overrides must be logged with justification
The system shall support up to 500 simultaneous operator connections
Database queries shall complete within 200ms for 95% of requests
All train location data must be encrypted both in transit and at rest using AES-256
The TMS shall operate 24/7 with 99.9% uptime
